title: FPS Explosives Pack
description: This pack contains 11 AAA quality game ready meshes/Textures for your Unreal FPS project.
longDescription:
This pack contains 11 AAA quality game ready meshes/texture sets for your FPS project. Each model's quality and polycount are equal to current FPS game standards. Your purchase includes high resolution 4K PBR textures that were created and exported out of Substance Painter for the Unreal Engine. All textures and meshes are in folders that are labeled with easy to understand naming conventions.

Features:

- Bouncing Betty Mine

- C4/IED Bomb

- Claymore Mine

- Flash Grenade

- Landmine

- M57 Remote "Clacker"

- M61 Grenade

- M67 Grenade

- Mk2 Grenade

- Smoke Grenade

- German Stick Grenade
technicalDetails:
Texture Size: 4096x4096: We offer Hi-Res Textures to give you the freedom to down res them to fit your project.

Physically Based Rendering: Yes, each variation comes with a Base Color, RMA Packed, and Normal map.

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: No, there are several ways you may approach the Collision for these weapons, we'll leave that up to you.

Vertex Count: Low-poly FBX files are included, ranging from 1.6k-3.9k tris, and are exported using compatible Unreal settings.

LODs: ** LOD's, Joints, Animations, VFX, Custom Collision and Sounds are NOT included. **

Number of Meshes: 11 individual meshes.

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 11 materials overall.

Number of Textures: 3 texture maps for each material, 33 overall.

Supported Target Build Platforms: These models could be used on any platform, but polycount and texture sizes are optimized for PC and Consoles.

Documentation: Check it out before you buy! https://skfb.ly/68LGY Check out our website: http://vert-candy.weebly.com/

Important/Additional Notes: It is assumed you have the basic knowledge to handle meshes and materials. If not, you may have to follow Unreal Engine's official documentation. If you have tried online documentation and still have questions, leave a message on VertCandy's Facebook pageÂ https://www.facebook.com/VertCandy. We'll try to solve your problem as soon as possible.

These game ready meshes are intended to get you started on creating a full game weapon experience. Sound FX, VFX, rigging, and animations are not included.
